comments.author: LisaRene
comments.content:
The struggle to get the photo taken and the food to the table hot!  My next dinnerware will be similar to the thick earthenware plates served blazing hot at Mexican restaurants :)

Fennel pollen is a new culinary item to me and very intriguing!

comments.author: Jenn
comments.content: Fennel is one of my new favorite vegetables.  I will be giving this a shot!
